articles.title: Gift from Syrian DM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Syrian DM
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift and a large floral basket from Ali Muhammad Habib Mahmoud, minister of Defence and deputy commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Syria, on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The gift and basket were handed to the DPRK ambassador to Syria by the director of the Section of Protocol of the Organizational and Administrative Department of the Syrian Defence Ministry, on Feb. 8.

articles.title: Reception Given for Military Attaches
articles.content:
Reception Given for Military Attaches
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces arranged a reception in honor of the military attaches corps here Friday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were the members of the corps.
					
					 Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Pak Jae Gyong, its vice-minister, and general officers and other officers of the KPA were on hand.
					
					 Kim Yong Chun said at the reception that Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA, equipped himself with matchless grit, pluck and wisdom while growing up in the flames of the anti-Japanese war and the anti-U.S. sacred war and has performed immortal exploits for the country and the people, the times and humankind with his distinguished political caliber and outstanding leadership ability.
					
					 The Korean army and people will as ever adhere to the ideas of independence, peace and friendship and strengthen the relations of friendship and cooperation with armies and peoples of all countries friendly toward the DPRK, he declared.
					
					 Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the corps, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung has wisely led the Korean army and people to achieve signal successes in socialist construction.
					
					 He hoped that the heroic army and people of the DPRK rallied as one in mind around the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il would make greater strides in building a thriving nation under the banner of Songun.
					
					 And he expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the armies of the military attaches' countries and the KPA would further develop.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Birthday Marked at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing Thursday gave a reception in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were the head of the Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China who is member of its Political Bureau, the permanent deputy head of the Organization Department of the C.C., CPC, a deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., CPC and the secretary-general of the Organization Department of the C.C., CPC and a vice-minister of Railways, a vice-minister of Culture, vice-presidents of the People's Daily and the Xinhua News Agency, the chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, an assistant to the foreign minister, a vice-president of the Academy of Military Sciences and other officials concerned of China.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, noted that Kim Jong Il has reliably defended the Korean-style socialist system and sovereignty of the nation and protected peace and security in Northeast Asia with his unique Songun politics and made undying contribution to strengthening the traditional DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 The Korean people are sure to win as there are the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, the unbreakable single-minded unity of the Party, the army and the people around the headquarters of the revolution, the powerful military strength and the solid foundation of the independent economy, he said.
					
					 The ambassador expressed the will to strive to steadily develop in depth the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations as intended by the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Li Yuanchao, head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee, said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoys respect and love from the Workers' Party of Korea and all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK as he has made signal successes in building Korean-style socialism while leading the Party and the people for a long period.
					
					 He expressed belief that under the guidance of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il the Korean people would make this year a year of weighty significance in the history of state development by perfectly carrying out the tasks laid down in the joint New Year editorial and win a greater victory in building a thriving nation, improving the external relations and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 It is the fixed strategic policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily develop the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations, he said, adding: We, together with the comrades of the DPRK, will boost the cooperation and exchange in all fields and constantly give fresh energy and momentum to the traditional bilateral friendship, thus building the rosier future of the above-said relations.

articles.title: Floral Baskets from Juche Idea Studies
articles.content:
Floral Baskets from Juche Idea Studies
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with floral baskets by the International Institute of the Juche Idea and Johnny Hon, chairman of the "International Kim Il Sung Foundation", on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The floral baskets were respectively conveyed to an official concerned Saturday.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was also presented with a floral basket on the same day by a Japanese delegation for the study of the Juche idea.
					
					 It was handed to an official concerned by head of the delegation Yuji Yokouchi, member of the Japanese Society for the Study of Kimilsungism, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Korean in Russia
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Korean in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the family of Jong Il Sim, Korean resident in Russia, on Saturday on the occasion of his birthday.

articles.title: Performance Given by Youth Art Squad
articles.content:
Performance Given by Youth Art Squad
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave a performance at the Central Youth Hall on Friday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Put on the stage of the performance, which began with narration and chorus "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", were male solo and pangchang "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", male duet "Listen to the Cheers of Emotion on That Day", dialogic poem "May That August Name Shine for All Ages" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers impressively represented the emotion on the day when Kim Jong Il was born as the bright star of Mt. Paektu and loudly sang of the undying feats of the peerlessly great man who is glorifying the dignity and honor of the country and the nation under the uplifted red flag of the revolution associated with the whole life of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Female solo "Silk Weaving Girl of Nyongbyon" and "Land and Peasant" and dance "Comrades, Let Us Meet at the Front" vividly represented the fixed will of the young vanguard to perform feats on all fronts of building an economic power as befitting the masters in the era of great surge.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Gives Performance in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Gives Performance in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance to celebrate February 16 "We Live Near the General" was given by the art troupe of Koreans in Japan at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Saturday.
					The art troupe put on the stage various numbers they prepared sincerely in boundless reverence for General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performers impressively depicted the great pride and self-esteem of the Korean nation led by Kim Jong Il, who has demonstrated the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea, in such numbers as instrumental music and song "Confetti of Best Wishes" and a female solo "Thinking about Father".
					
					 Repertoire also included a trio dance "Dance of Janggu", a kayagum solo "Song of the Sea" that showed dexterous and elegant rhythm and skilled rendition.
					
					 Male solo "Let's Pass High Hill" and mixed chorus "Toward 2012" vividly showed the steadfast faith and will of the Koreans in Japan to firmly defend the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, a precious patriotic legacy bequeathed by President Kim Il Sung, and advance along the road of patriotism to the last under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Minister of Culture An Tong Chun, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang watched the performance.
					
					 The performance will go on.

articles.title: Documentary Film Screened
articles.content:
Documentary Film Screened
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Documentary film "Great Succession" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The film deals with the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il, who is successfully carrying into practice the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung, performed by leading the sacred struggle for the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 It tells about the facts that he has strengthened the People's Army into the army of the Party, the invincible revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 It also shows the noble personality of Kim Jong Il who has taken care of life and destiny of the revolutionary soldiers in a responsible manner to the end by inheriting the tradition of comradeship created in the days of the hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and provided with his politics of boundless love and trust the unbreakable harmonious whole in which the leader, the Party and the people are united in ideology and will and moral obligation.
					
					 Watching the film were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Paektusan Secret Camp Visited by Many People
articles.content:
Paektusan Secret Camp Visited by Many People
						
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- With General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday approaching, a great number of people have visited the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					 In the endless stream of visitors, there are service members, working people, youth and schoolchildren.
					
					The camp, set up by President Kim Il Sung in the latter half of the 1930s, served as a hub of the Korean revolution and a secret base for the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA). It is also a sacred place of the revolution where Kim Jong Il was born and spent his early childhood.
					
					 Preserved well there are the KPRA Headquarters log cabin used by Kim Il Sung, the old home of Kim Jong Il and other relics.
					
					 Looking round the camp the visitors learn the glorious revolutionary history and immortal exploits of the three great persons, including anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk, and refresh their determination to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, started on Mt. Paektu by the President, under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean Children Receive Leader's Birthday Presents
articles.content:
Korean Children Receive Leader's Birthday Presents 
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- All the children of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have received presents on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il (February 16).
					 Traditionally in the country, all the children have been given presents by the state every year on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the birthday of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The tradition had been carried on even in the period of "Arduous March", the forced march, not excepting the children in remote villages and solitary islands.
					
					 Last year beacon islets belonging to North Phyongan Province had sea routes blocked by abnormal climatic conditions, making the children and their parents and teachers take it as a matter of course to see presents coming late. 
					
					 But presents were transported by a helicopter for a small number of children, a measure taken by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: 1,700 Rare Animals Sent as Gifts
articles.content:
1,700 Rare Animals Sent as Gifts
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Rare animals have been sent to Korea as gifts for General Secretary Kim Jong Il by state and party leaders and other prominent figures of many countries and overseas Koreans, deeply revering him as "Sun of the 21st Century".
					They total nearly 1,700 of some 200 species -- 72 species of animals, 35 species of fowls, 29 species of amphibious reptiles and 80 species of fishes.
					
					 Included in the gifts, sent to him on the occasions of his birthday and other major holidays of the Korean people, are horses of Orlov breed from former Russian President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin in Juche 92 (2003), eight horses of a Mongolian breed from former Mongolian President Nambariin Enkhbayar in 2007, a parrot with gray-red train from Equatorial Guinean President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo in 1988 and Lesser Bush Baby and other animals from Zimbabwean President Robert G. Mugabe in 1985.
					
					 Jonas Wahlstrom, director of the Skansen Aquarium in Sweden, since he sent gift animals to stuff an animal museum in Korea in 1985, has sent more than 160 species of rare animals to him in ten or more installments. 
					
					 Choe Su Jin, general manager of the Heilongjiang Provincial National Economic Development Company of China, sent a pair of white tigers to him in 2004.
					
					 Among the overseas Koreans who sent gifts to him is also Choe Chong San who was vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China.

articles.title: Egyptian Figure Songun Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Songun Politics Praised by Egyptian Party Leader
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Ahmad Hassan, general secretary of the Nasser Arab Democratic Party of Egypt, issued a statement on Feb. 8 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					He said in the statement that Kim Jong Il has led the socialist cause to victory by successfully carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					He went on:
					
					Kim Jong Il has wisely led the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation, decisively frustrating the challenges and threats of all the hostile forces and honorably defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country with his Songun politics.
					
					All the achievements made by the Korean people are greatly inspiring the world progressives aspiring after independence.
					
					Positively supporting the Korean people's just cause, I express conviction that the Korean people will emerge victorious in the great drive for building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed  in Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Greatest Holiday Observed in Russia
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Russia on February 9 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were figures of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and other people. Present there on invitation were officials of the DPRK embassy in Moscow.
					
					 First Vice-Chairman Yuri Vanin and Secretary Petrov of the association and Veredin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, made speeches at the meeting.
					
					 The speakers highly praised Kim Jong Il as a great world political elder, a great master and an outstanding thinker, philosopher and practician whom no statesman can ever match at present.
					
					 Noting that the national defence capability of the DPRK has reached its highest level, it has turned into an impregnable fortress and the Korean people are fully prepared to beat back any provocation of enemies thanks to the Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il, they added that the Songun politics serves as an ever-victorious banner for achieving the prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 Hailing the proposal of the DPRK for concluding a peace treaty as an entirely just one, they extended full support to it and expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve new success in their efforts to improve their standard of living this year.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il from the association and the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union were adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: FM Spokesman on Its Delegation's China Visit
articles.content:
FM Spokesman on Its Delegation's China Visit
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on Saturday in connection with its delegation's China visit:
					 The delegation led by Kim Kye Gwan, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, visited China from Feb. 9 to 13 at the invitation of Wu Dawei, special envoy of the Chinese government for the affairs of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 During the visit both sides had an in-depth discussion on the issue of boosting the DPRK-China relations and matters of speeding up the denuclearization of the peninsula through confidence building such as the conclusion of a peace treaty, the lifting of sanctions and the resumption of the six-party talks.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet to Vow to Implement Joint Calls
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet to Vow to Implement Joint Calls
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A mass rally of Pyongyangites took place at Kim Il Sung Square Saturday to vow to thoroughly carry out the joint calls issued by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea on the occasion of its 65th birthday.
					Present there were Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jung Rin, Yang Hyong Sop and leading officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials of institutions, industrial establishments and cooperative farms, labor heroes and innovators and more than 100,000 citizens in Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe Yong Rim, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, in his report said that the joint calls comprehensively indicating the tasks for winning a victory in the great drive to build a thriving nation serve as a militant banner arousing all the servicepersons and people once again to a gigantic campaign for a final victory.
					
					He said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has provided ceaseless field guidance to the sites for effecting a great surge since the outset of the new year with his firm will to bring about a drastic turn in improving the people's standard of living this significant year, too.
					
					 He called on all the citizens to firmly defend and eternally glorify the undisputed authority of Kim Jong Il and his undying Songun leadership feats, cherishing the great pride and honor of living close to him and become genuine Songun revolutionary fighters and comrades following his forced march while sharing the same idea and determination and keeping pace with him.
					
					 All the officials, party members and other working people should learn from the ideas and spirits of the workers and technicians of the February 8 Vinalon Complex, who made a great leap forward in the production and construction with the might of self-reliance and brought about a great auspicious event to the whole country and thus make the waves of the drive to push back the frontiers of science and technology sweep it.
					
					 Representatives of people of various strata in their speeches said that the servicepersons and people are sure to emerge victors thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il and the might of their  single-minded unity behind the headquarters of the revolution, calling upon all the officials, party members and other working people to glorify the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the WPK as a grand political festival for demonstrating the heroic spirit of Kim Il Sung's Korea in hearty response to the great Party's calls.

articles.title: Figure Skaters Here
articles.content:
Figure Skaters Here
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Figure skaters of Russia, Switzerland and France arrived here by air on Saturday to attend the 19th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize to be held to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Arriving here earlier were figure skaters from Hungary, Belarus, Australia, Ukraine and the U.K.

articles.title: Unity under Banner of Independence Called for
articles.content:
Unity under Banner of Independence Called for
						
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Unity under the banner of independence should be achieved to realize independence of each country and nation and accomplish the cause of global independence.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 To unite under the banner of independence is the fundamental principle of the revolutionary struggle and a decisive guarantee for its victory, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The reactionaries of history are in mortal fear of the popular masses' cohesion under the banner of independence and, accordingly, they attempt to check it at any cost.
					
					 Now the imperialists are making desperate efforts to break the unity of the progressive people struggling for independence and gratify their wild ambition for domination over the world.
					
					 Their cunning and mean moves to sow disintegration and dissension are bringing dispute and confrontation and even armed conflict and war crisis to different regions and countries.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the countries and nations desirous of independence and peace should closely unite under the banner of independence and vigorously wage the concerted struggle against the imperialists seeking world supremacy.
					
					 To strengthen international solidarity of those countries and nations is essential for achieving the unity of the world forces for independence against imperialism and intensifying the joint struggle.
					
					 The international unity is achieved and strengthened when all countries and nations support the struggle and activities of each other for independence and ensure their solidarity.
					
					 The movement for strengthened unity of the anti-imperialist independent forces and their joint struggle is getting intensified and the advance toward independence being accelerated in Asia, Africa, Latin America and other regions of the world. On the contrary, the dominationist forces are getting further weakened and isolated, thus rolling into a pit of ruin day by day.
					
					 The cause of global independence is sure to emerge victorious by the struggle of the progressive people united under the banner of independence.

articles.title: Indian Figure Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Indian Figure Meets DPRK Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A. B. Bardhan, general secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, met with the DPRK ambassador to India on Feb. 5.
					 The general secretary said that the Communist Party of India and the Workers' Party of Korea have long-standing friendly relations and supported and solidarized with each other in the struggle against imperialism and for the socialist cause.
					
					 Fully supporting the joint editorial of the leading newspapers of the DPRK, he wished the Korean people successes in their struggle to implement the militant tasks set forth in the joint editorial under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 The DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty is a positive one to realize the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, he noted, demanding the U.S. respond to this proposal of the DPRK and come out to the talks aimed at concluding a peace treaty.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Mexican
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Mexican
Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The 23rd Congress of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico expressed full support for the Korean people's just cause.
					 The "statement supporting the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the independent reunification of the country" was adopted at the congress on Feb. 6.
					
					 It said:
					
					 We, attending the 23rd Congress of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, hope that the WPK and the Korean people will glorify this year marking the 65th anniversary of the founding of the WPK as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of building a thriving nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this significant year.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean authorities' treacherous moves against reunification and extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to make new progress in the movement for national reunification under the banner of the north-south joint declaration.
					
					 We express conviction that the WPK and the Korean people will continue to consolidate and develop the DPRK into an invincible power and a socialist fortress under the experienced and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ukraine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Ukraine
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism" was brought out in booklet by a Ukrainian publishing house.
					 This is his talk to leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on February 26 and 28, Juche 91 (2002).
					
					 The work clarifies the appearance and development of nationalism, the essence of genuine nationalism and its progressive nature and tasks for preserving the national character and defending and realizing national independence, etc.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony was held in Kiev on February 1.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe felicitaciones de ministro siriaco de Defensa Nacional
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Korean in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from the family of Jong Il Sim, Korean resident in Russia, on Saturday on the occasion of his birthday.

articles.title: MINREX informa visita a China de su delegacion
articles.content:
MINREX informa visita a China de su delegacion
						
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- Consultado por la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea en relacion con la visita a China de la delegacion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz de esta cancilleria respondio el dia 13 como lo siguiente:
					  La delegacion del MINREX encabezada por el viceministro Kim Kye Gwan realizo del dia 9 al 13 una visita a China por la invitacion de Wu Daewi, delegado especial encargado del problema de la Peninsula Coreana del gobierno chino.
					
					  Durante esta visita, ambas partes discutieron a fondo los problemas destinados a fomentar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana mediante la creacion de la confianza, tales como las relaciones Corea-China, la concertacion del convenio de paz, el levantamiento de la sancion y el reinicio de las conversaciones a 6 bandas.

articles.title: MINFAP ofrece banquete en honor de Cuerpo de Agregados Militares
articles.content:
MINFAP ofrece banquete en honor de Cuerpo de Agregados Militares
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares ofrecio el dia 12 un banquete en honor del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares acreditados en Corea.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados los miembros del cuerpo citado.
					
					Participaron en ella el submariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el viceministro de las FAP Pak Jae Gyong y los generales y oficiales del EPC.
					
					Kim Yong Chun senalo en su discurso que el Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il, quien crecio en las llamas de la gran lucha antijaponesa y antiyanqui cultivando la audacia, coraje e inteligencia sin iguales, realizo inmortales hazanas por la patria, el pueblo, la epoca y la humanidad con su extraordinaria capacidad politica y de guia.
					
					Subrayo que el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos mantendran en el futuro tambien el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad y fortaleceran las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con los ejercitos y los pueblos de todos los paises que tratan amistosamente a la RPDC.
					
					El agregado militar de la embajada china en Corea, Sun Yanfeng, quien preside el cuerpo de sus colegas, senalo en su intervencion que en pleno acato al legado del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente          Kim Jong Il logro grandes exitos en la construccion socialista dirigiendo sabiamente al ejercito y al pueblo de Corea.
					
					Deseo que el heroico ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, unidos monoliticamente en torno al Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por el Dirigente, logren un avance mas grande en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que se desarrollaran aun mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los ejercitos de los paises de los agregados militares y el EPC.

articles.title: Capitalinos se deciden a materializar consignas conjuntas del partido
articles.content:
Capitalinos se deciden a materializar consignas conjuntas del partido
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este sabado en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de los pyongyaneses por la materializacion cabal de las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea publicadas en ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de este partido.
					  Al conclave asistieron Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jung Rin, Yang Hyong Sop, los funcionarios directivos de las organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales y de los organismos, fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los heroes del trabajo, los innovadores laborales y mas de 100 mil capitalinos.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Yong Rim, secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					  Las consignas conjuntas, que presentaron globalmente las tareas de lucha por lograr el triunfo de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera, devienen la bandera combativa que vuelve a llamar a todo el ejercito y el pueblo a la gran campana por la victoria final, senalo el informante y continuo:
					
					  Desde los primeros dias de este ano significativo, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il orienta tambien sucesivamente en el terreno los sectores en campana, donde se produce el gran auge, partiendo de su firme decision de imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo.
					
					  Con el gran orgullo y honor de vivir cerca del Dirigente, todos los capitalinos deben defender la absoluta autoridad  de el y glorificar sus inmortales proezas acumuladas en la direccion del Songun.
					
					  Tambien deben ser verdaderos combatientes de la revolucion del Songun y camaradas de la marcha forzada que compartan el ideal y la disposicion con el Dirigente y marquen los pasos con el.
					
					  Todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y otros trabajadores deben lograr con el poderio de autoconfianza un gran salto en la produccion y la construccion y hacer mas fuerte la oleada de la conquista de la cumbre tecnologica aprendiendo el espiritu de los obreros y tecnicos del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero quienes trajeron un gran jubilo para todo el pais.
					
					  Los representantes de distintos sectores afirmaron en sus intervenciones que es definitiva la victoria gracias a la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y al poderio de la unidad monolitica del ejercito y el pueblo en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					  Enfatizaron que todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y otros trabajadores deben hacer del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido un gran festival politico, que manifieste a todo el mundo el impetu heroico de la Corea de Kim Il Sung, al responder con el corazon al llamamiento del gran partido.
